price: Seni aldatmak isterlerse bil ki, şüphesiz Allah sana yeter. O, seni yardımıyla ve müminlerle destekleyendir.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُوٓاْ أَن يَخۡدَعُوكَ فَإِنَّ حَسۡبَكَ ٱللَّهُۚ هُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَيَّدَكَ بِنَصۡرِهِۦ وَبِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū an yakhdaʿūka fa-inna ḥasbaka al-lahu huwa alladhī ayyadaka binaṣrihi wabil-mu'minīna
